q: Reacting to a story about the friendship between Debbie Walsh Wasserman-Schultz, Gabrielle Giffords , and Kirsten Gillibrand , Shani Hilton observes: It's good that the women who are there have been able to support one another, but this is a reminder that women haven't made many inroads in Congress- or the congressional leadership- in nearly a decade. The 2010 election saw the first drop in women in Congress since 1979, from 93 to 90. It was also the first year since 1979 that women

While Philadelphia remained 2 1/2 games behind Boston in the Atlantic Division, Chris Webber gave a glimpse of what he could contribute down the stretch. " Elgin Baylor think every little bit helps your confidence," Chris Webber said. One day you're averaging a number that many people don't do in three categories and the next day you're worthless. And that's from myself, Elgin Baylor don't even care what everyone else is saying. Allen Iverson , who had nine assists, knew Chris Webber was trying too hard to meet monstrous expectations. the war that President Bush launched in March 2003, about six weeks after Colin Powell 's U.N. speech. The U.S. never found substantial evidence of an active Iraqi program to produce weapons of mass destruction. For whatever reason, the administration never made public these facts about an active WMD production facility run by terrorists in Iraq, Rumsfeld wrote. He said he made his recommendation to President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell previewed his presentation to the U.N. in two days.
